data.title: FREE Punjabi to Hindi Translation
data.meta_description: Online Punjabi to Hindi Translation Software - Official Punjabi Site for Translating Punjabi to Hindi for FREE. Typing 'ਤੁਸੀ ਕਿਵੇਂ ਹੋ?' will translate it into 'आप कैसे हैं?'.
data.text:
Our Punjabi to Hindi Translation Tool is powered by Google Translation API. You can start typing in the left-hand text area and then click on the "Translate" button. Our app will then translate your Punjabi word, phrase, or sentence into hindi. You can also visit our homepage to type in Punjabi.

The translation only takes a few seconds and allows up to 500 characters to be translated in one request. Although this translation may not be 100% accurate, you can still get a basic idea, and with a few modifications, it can be quite accurate. This translation software is evolving day by day, and Google Engineers are continuously working on it to make Punjabi to hindi translation more intelligent and accurate. Hopefully, one day it will produce near-perfect translations!

Punjabi language is widely spoken, with more than 130 million people around the world speaking it. For Punjabi Speaker whose hindi is not strong, translating from Punjabi to Hindi can be quite difficult. Many websites provide services to translate hindi for a fee. While it is a good idea to pay for translating large amounts of text (such as books or articles) or for professional services, there is no need to pay for commonly used sentences, greeting messages, and other informal uses. For these purposes, our tool can be quite helpful.

You can copy the translated text and then share it on social media platforms such as Facebook or Twitter, or email it to your friends or family.
